arrow_keys: Arrow keys: Move around the board
number_keys: Number keys: Write a note or set the sudoku number
show_circle_menu: Show circle menu when a cell is clicked (desktop only)
show_occurrences: Show occurrences of numbers in number buttons
about_text: This sudoku app is and will be free of charge, free of ads and free of tracking. Its source code is available at
report_issue: If you find a bug or experience any issues, please report it on
no_sudokus_in_collection: There are no sudokus in this collection. Add one by clicking the 'Add sudoku' button.
cannot_delete_base_collection: You cannot delete the base collection.
confirm_delete_collection: Are you sure you want to delete collection "{{collection}}"? This will delete all sudokus in it.
add_your_own_sudoku: Add your own sudoku. Set the numbers and you can play it. This sudoku will be added to the "{{collection}}" collection.
select_game_subtitle: Select a new sudoku to play or continue with an already started game.
enter_new_collection_name: Enter the name of the new sudoku collection:
confirm_clear: Are you sure you want to restart this game? Your progress will be lost.
